scripts.examples-file: rm -fr gen && npm run go examples/*
scripts.examples-render: npm run examples-file #!/usr/bin/env node&& npm run docgen
scripts.focus-file: rm -fr gen && npm run go examples/focus.ts
scripts.focus-render: npm run focus-file && npm run docgen
scripts.test: npm run go examples/test-* && tap --reporter spec --no-coverage build/test
scripts.test-direct: npm run go examples/test-* && node build/test/docholiday.test.js
scripts.docgen: rm -fr doc && npm run docgen-jsdoc && open -a "Google Chrome" doc/index.html
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && cd ./booksrc && honkit build
scripts.docs:serve: npm run docs:prepare && cd ./booksrc && honkit serve
